mapper.select: SELECT A.BLTN_CONTENT_NO , A.BID_PJT_TCD , A.BLTN_CONTENT , A.SRCH_CNT , A.DEL_YN , A.SUBJ, A.INS_PERSON_ID , (SELECT X.USER_NM FROM TCOM.TB_USER_INFO X WHERE X.DEL_YN = 'N' AND X.USER_ID = A.INS_PERSON_ID) AS INS_PERSON_NM , A.INS_DATE , A.INS_TIME , A.UPD_PERSON_ID , A.UPD_DATE , A.UPD_TIME , A.LSP_GRP_CD, (select L.lsp_grp_nm from TEBS.tb_lsp_pool_info L where L.lsp_grp_cd = A.lsp_grp_cd limit 1) as LSP_GRP_NM, COALESCE(A.DW_MAIL_SEND_F , 'N') DW_MAIL_SEND_F, A.LSP_GRP_CD FROM TEBS.TB_BID_NOTI_INFO A WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.INS_DATE >= #{ins_start_date} AND A.INS_DATE <= #{ins_end_date} AND A.SUBJ LIKE '%'|| REPLACE(REPLACE(#{subj} , '%' , CHR(1)||'%') , '_' , CHR(1)||'_') || '%' ESCAPE CHR(1)
